import "./intro.css"; import Me from "../../img/Me.png"; const Intro = () => { return (

Welcome to my website

Hello, My name is

Afia Muntakim

Area of Interest

Cyber Security
Android Develment
Web Development
UI/UX Design
Software testing
Data Science
); }; export default Intro;
